name: TreeRegexpTest
description: Unit tests for the TreeRegexp class, which handles regular expressions and their groups.

test_cases.name: exposes_group_source
test_cases.description: Tests if the TreeRegexp class correctly exposes the source of its groups.

test_cases.name: builds_tree
test_cases.description: Tests if the TreeRegexp class correctly builds a tree of groups from a given input string.

test_cases.name: ignores_question_mark_colon_non_capturing_group
test_cases.description: Tests if the TreeRegexp class correctly ignores non-capturing groups denoted by '(?:...)'.

test_cases.name: ignores_question_mark_exclamation_mark_non_capturing_group
test_cases.description: Tests if the TreeRegexp class correctly ignores non-capturing groups denoted by '(?!...)'.

test_cases.name: ignores_question_mark_equal_sign_non_capturing_group
test_cases.description: Tests if the TreeRegexp class correctly ignores non-capturing groups denoted by '(?=...)'.

test_cases.name: ignores_question_mark_less_than_equal_sign_non_capturing_group
test_cases.description: Tests if the TreeRegexp class correctly ignores non-capturing groups denoted by '(?<=...)'.

test_cases.name: ignores_question_mark_less_than_exclamation_mark_non_capturing_group
test_cases.description: Tests if the TreeRegexp class correctly ignores non-capturing groups denoted by '(?<!...)'.

test_cases.name: ignores_question_mark_greater_then_non_capturing_group
test_cases.description: Tests if the TreeRegexp class correctly ignores non-capturing groups denoted by '(?>...)'.

test_cases.name: matches_named_capturing_group
test_cases.description: Tests if the TreeRegexp class correctly matches named capturing groups denoted by '(?<name>...)'.

test_cases.name: matches_optional_group
test_cases.description: Tests if the TreeRegexp class correctly matches optional groups denoted by '(...)?'.

test_cases.name: matches_nested_groups
test_cases.description: Tests if the TreeRegexp class correctly matches nested groups.

test_cases.name: captures_non_capturing_groups_with_capturing_groups_inside
test_cases.description: Tests if the TreeRegexp class correctly captures non-capturing groups that contain capturing groups inside.

test_cases.name: detects_multiple_non_capturing_groups
test_cases.description: Tests if the TreeRegexp class correctly detects multiple non-capturing groups.

test_cases.name: works_with_escaped_backslash
test_cases.description: Tests if the TreeRegexp class correctly handles escaped backslashes in the regular expression.

test_cases.name: works_with_slash_which_doesnt_need_escaping_in_java
test_cases.description: Tests if the TreeRegexp class correctly handles slashes in the regular expression, which do not need escaping in Java.

test_cases.name: works_digit_and_word
test_cases.description: Tests if the TreeRegexp class correctly matches digits and words in the regular expression.

test_cases.name: captures_start_and_end
test_cases.description: Tests if the TreeRegexp class correctly captures the start and end positions of groups in the input string.

test_cases.name: doesnt_consider_parenthesis_in_character_class_as_group
test_cases.description: Tests if the TreeRegexp class correctly handles parentheses within character classes without considering them as groups.

test_cases.name: works_with_flags
test_cases.description: Tests if the TreeRegexp class correctly handles regular expressions with flags.

test_cases.name: works_with_inline_flags
test_cases.description: Tests if the TreeRegexp class correctly handles regular expressions with inline flags.

test_cases.name: works_with_non_capturing_inline_flags
test_cases.description: Tests if the TreeRegexp class correctly handles regular expressions with non-capturing inline flags.

test_cases.name: empty_capturing_group
test_cases.description: Tests if the TreeRegexp class correctly handles empty capturing groups.

test_cases.name: empty_non_capturing_group
test_cases.description: Tests if the TreeRegexp class correctly handles empty non-capturing groups.

test_cases.name: empty_look_ahead
test_cases.description: Tests if the TreeRegexp class correctly handles empty look-ahead groups.

test_cases.name: uses_loaded_pattern_compiler_service
test_cases.description: Tests if the TreeRegexp class correctly uses a loaded pattern compiler service.
